body:
It's been nearly 5 months since I last posted an AMA and a lot
of stuff has happened since then, so I thought I'd make another.

I'll answer almost anything :P
body_tagged:
It's been nearly 5 months since I last posted an AMA and a lot
of stuff has happened since then, so I thought I'd make another.

I'll answer almost anything :P

Snowy my boy, I've heard rumours of you applying next staff apps, then we can (hopefully :P) be juniors together. c:

OH MY GOD! HOW MANY OPINIONS ON ME POSTS IS THERE?!?!?! IT'S ABOUT SNOW, NOT YOU. >~<

  • Do you still hate me for eating so loud in the staff meeting? ^-^
  • Snowlas or no Snowlas? O.o

replies.body: Are you in the north island or south island? 'No comment,' is not an answer.
replies.body_tagged: Are you in the north island or south island? 'No comment,' is not an answer.

replies.body:
@Sessp: You're such an awesome wombat, you're pretty much the king of all wombats.
Forget the Senior Mod tag, you need a King Wombat tag.
I've toned down the "mini-modding", these new Mods can hold their own pretty well :P
It's been 2 months? Feel a lot longer than that xD
Loving Star Wars Rebels, wish it came on more than just once a week..
Senior Mod on Avicus.. I have more friends here.

@Base: I always like how you're always a chill guy, we always get along when we talk.

@Fliikky: I like it, it'll provide an interesting challenge. 

@Tynvale: I've always appreciated your sense of humour.. when you can Sess have a go at me, I stand no chance haha

@et: You're basically a staff member without the rank. I love your attitude, you're always out there helping others, it's awesome.

@Jake: Jake! <3
Life's been good, getting a bit busy with exams in 2 weeks..... but other than it, all's been good :)
Being staff was such a great experience. I love helping people, it was right up my alley.
We need to catch up and start playing Walls again. We would destroy everyone and everything in our path!

@Aura: ooo Rumours
I'm so hyped for the next Star Wars movie, can't wait to see it!
I don't hate you xD It was a weird mix of annoying and hilarity.. a very weird combination of emotions to feel xD
No Snowlas haha

@DaFrozenBlaze: There're quite a few people better than me at "mini-modding".
I am excellent with the bow. No-one can touch me... unless they use a sword..

@SaltMagnet: 1.8 PVP is fine, it's 1.9 that'll take some getting used to.
Avicus going 1.8 will be so good because the majority of the blocklag will be destroyed.
Apparently Ogres are like onions or something...which is weird because they look nothing like onions...

@Pizza: It snows once every few years where I live..it's quite a rare occurrence. We don't get the snow, but we get the cold that comes from it...

@Sky: I'm scared for you and your knife fetish xD
I don't plan on it but let's be honest, it will probably happen again somehow.
I don't know anymore...it's sunny in the evenings sooo whatever that means.
Snowlas ain't a thing you damn ship starter :P 

@Pe: Kate Marsh
NO SPOILERS
Already here.
I love how you can flip tables while eating nutella simultaneously.
Cricket all the way.

@Rile: Rile babe! <3
 I like how we both suck at Walls...stupid Rilo..
World Peace probably won't happen any time soon, but we'll get there.
FrozenRile...I'm not gonna vote for my ship xD

@Dionoxic: I do, how'd you guess?

@Cupcake: No comment.
